---
title: "Survey Team"
output: html_document
---

```{r, results = 'asis', echo = F}

sub_docs <- subset(x = full_site0, 
                   subset = page == "personnel" & 
                     sub_page == "survey_team")
clean_titles <- make_clean_names(sub_docs$title)

string <- ""

#link to html if files exists, otherwise link to forms_files folder
for (i in 1:nrow(sub_docs)) {
  if(clean_titles[[i]] %in% no_templ){
    string <- paste0("[", sub_docs$title[[i]], "](../docs/personnel_", clean_titles[[i]], ".html)", "<br><br>")
  } else {
    string <- paste0("[", sub_docs$title[[i]], "](../", 
                     sub_docs$url_loc[i], ")", "<br><br>")
  }
  cat(string)
}
```
